name.es: Info del Tamaño de la Imagen

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inserts option in the browser's image context menu to view image width, height and file size.
short.es: Agregar una opción en el menú contextual del navegador sobre una imagen para ver su ancho, su alto y el peso del archivo.
short.fi: Lisää vaihtoehdon selaimen kuvapikavalikkoon, jonka kautta voi nähdä kuvan leveyden, korkeuden ja tiedostokoon.
short.sr: Dodaje mogućnost pregleda informacija o slici, uključujući širinu, visinu i veličinu datoteke.
short.sv: Infogar alternativ i kontextmenyn för bilder. Visar bildens bredd, höjd och filstorlek.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works for images and videos (webm, gifv).


NOTES:


If extension popup cannot be closed right after you install the extension, you need to restart your browser.

Some information like file size and date are returned from the server, this information depends on the server setup and can sometimes be wrong, which is especially true for the date field.

Does not work with CSS background images due to browser API limitations.

Does not work on Chrome web store, this is a Chrome security measure.


:: Minimum Requirements
  Requires at least Chrome v100.
